page.title: 02ST.ALLEN PARISH CHURCH.
page.content: The well_kept 15th C.Church has a regular,thriving congregation from surrounding farms & Idless,Allet,& fast_growing Shortlanesend villages. One churchwarden farms nearby Lanner Barton;the vicar,Alan,is a non_ stipendiary priest,solicitor in Truro. The electoral roll has 35 names;25 to 30 attend weekly +12 to 14 in Sunday School run by 3 ladies during service. {Services:}1st&3rd Sunday in month Holy Eucharist 9:30a.m.attended mainly by non_farmers;2nd&4th Sundays,Morning Prayer & Holy Eucharist,11.15a.m. more popular with farmers;5th Sundays & Festivals,Holy Eucharist/Evensong6.30. Ladies do Church_cleaning & flower_ arranging on rota.There is always much conversation after services.Other events:Parochial Church Council meets, Harvest Supper,coffee evenings.Annual Show & Gymkhana raised Â£250 for Church
